dict.acceptation: 装置，设备；方法；策略；手段；

sent.orig: Device objects can have names that conventionally live in the \Device directory.
sent.trans: 设备对象可以具有在路径\Device中历来存在的名称。

sent.orig: The device name in the device.INF or media.INI file is too long.
sent.trans: 在device.inf或media.ini文件中的设备名称太长。

sent.orig: For device you substitute the name, or the IP address, of your device.
sent.trans: 对于device,你要用设备的名称或者IP地址来替换。

sent.orig: With the DSF(Device Security Framework) Infrastructure and SDK, applications can now be made "Device-Aware".
sent.trans: 设备端安全架构(Device Security Framework)简称DSF,是为开发有安全需要的应用程序提供开发类库和安全架构。

sent.orig: The device includes sliver feeding device, alkali impregnating device, mercerizing device, rinsing and drying device.
sent.trans: 该装置包括棉条喂入装置、碱液浸渍装置、丝光装置、水洗和烘干装置。
